text: Peter Erskine (born June 5, 1954) is an American jazz drummer. He was a member of the jazz fusion groups Weather Report and Steps Ahead. Erskine was born in Somers Point, New Jersey. His career began in 1972. ==References== ==Other websites== * Podcast featuring "Joy Luck" by Peter Erskine *Peter Erskine Interview NAMM Oral History Library (2011) Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:American drummers Category:American jazz musicians Category:Musicians from New Jersey
title: Peter Erskine
